alert.note: Alert for Somerset; Wicomico; Worcester (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 30 at 8:13PM EDT until August 30 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SOMERSET...SOUTHEASTERN WICOMICO AND CENTRAL WORCESTER COUNTIES... At 813 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Parsonsburg to near Westover, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Parsonsburg around 820 PM EDT. Snow Hill and Newark around 900 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Bishop, Salisbury-Wicomico, Cokesbury, Eden, Allen, Willards, Lakewood, Longridge, Chesapeake Heights and Pittsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
